CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. PC 70 BM

Both PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM are material names mentioned in the paragraph. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) is a specific type of polymer material, and PC 70 BM is a specific type of fullerene material used in the bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. PC 70 BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

1. Bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
3. PC 70 BM
4. Photocurrent response
5. Wavelength range
6. From 300 nm
7. To 1.1 μm.

The "Property Name" entities in this paragraph are:

1. Bulk heterojunction type (type of polymer solar cells)
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM (specific materials used in the polymer solar cells)
3. Photocurrent response (property of the solar cells)
4. Wavelength range (property of the photocurrent response).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. PC 70 BM
3. Wavelength range
4. From 300 nm to 1.1 μm

These are the entities that clearly refer to material properties in the paragraph:

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM (specific materials used in the polymer solar cells)
2. Wavelength range (property of the light response of the solar cells).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |
| wavelength range |
| from 300 nm to 1.1 μm |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

1. Bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells: This is a type of solar cell. It is not a property value, but rather a description of the solar cells.
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is a specific type of polymer material used in the solar cells. It is not a property value, but rather a material name.
3. PC 70 BM: This is another specific type of polymer material used in the solar cells. It is also not a property value, but rather a material name.
4. broad photocurrent response wavelength range: This is a property value of the solar cells. It describes the range of wavelengths at which the solar cells can generate a photocurrent.
5. from 300 nm to 1.1 μm: These are specific values that define the range of the property "photocurrent response wavelength range".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. broad photocurrent response wavelength range: This is a property value of the solar cells. It describes the range of wavelengths at which the solar cells can generate a photocurrent.
2. from 300 nm to 1.1 μm: These are specific values that define the range of the property "photocurrent response wavelength range".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                   |
|-------------------------------|
| broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm |
